app.title: 3D Printed Paper Craft
mainpage.guideVideo.label: Guide Video
toolbar.left.renderLoad.label: Render load: {count}
preview.right.faceCount.label: Faces: {count}
settings.title: Project Settings
settings.scale.label: Scale
settings.scale.desc: Overall model scale. If it’s too small, generating the print file may fail.
settings.layerHeight.label: Layer Height
settings.layerHeight.desc: Layer height for printing. Max {max}, default {def}, in mm.
settings.connectionLayers.label: Connection Layers
settings.bodyLayers.label: Extra Body Layers
settings.bodyLayers.desc: Additional layers for the main body of faces. {min}-{max}, default {def}.
settings.tabWidth.label: Seam Tab Width
settings.tabWidth.desc: Width of seam tabs for bonding. {min}-{max}, default {def}, in mm.
settings.tabThickness.label: Seam Tab Thickness
settings.tabThickness.desc: Thickness of seam tabs for bonding. {min}-{max}, default {def}, in mm.
settings.tabClipGap.label: Clip Fit Gap
settings.tabClipGap.desc: Tab clip gap (tightness). Larger = easier to fit. {min}-{max}, default {def}.
settings.clipGapAdjusts.label: Clip Gap Adjuest
settings.clipGapAdjusts.desc: Clip fit gap auto-adjusts inversely to tab thickness.
settings.hollow.label: Hollow Style
settings.hollow.desc: Removes the center area of each triangle face. Off by default.
settings.wireframeThickness.label: Wireframe Thickness
settings.wireframeThickness.desc: Wireframe thickness in Hollow Style. {min}-{max}, default {def}, in mm.
op.group.rename: Click and hold group tab to rename
op.group.face.add: Left-click to add face to group
op.group.face.remove: Right-click to remove face from group
log.demo.loadFail: Failed to load the demo project. Please try again later.
log.group.rename.invalid: Invalid group name. Please enter at least one visible character
log.file.unsupported: Unsupported format. Please choose OBJ / FBX / STL
log.file.loadFailed: Load failed. Please check the file format
log.export.selfIntersect: The current group has self-intersections. Cannot generate the model
log.export.noFaces: The current group has no faces. Cannot export
log.export.step.fail: Group STEP export failed. Check the console logs
log.export.stl.cached: Exporting group STL using cached mesh...
log.export.stl.fail: Group STL export failed. Check the console logs
log.replicad.mesh.fail: Replicad mesh generation failed. Check the console logs
log.export.seamClip.fail: Seam clip export failed. Check the console logs
log.group.removeDisconnectCancel: Removing would disconnect the group. Canceled
log.group.hiddenAddBlocked: Cannot add faces to a hidden group. Unhide it first
log.group.removeWillDisconnect: Removing this face would disconnect its group. Not added to the current group
log.group.noSharedEdge: This face shares no edge with the current group. Not added
log.group.deleteKeepOne: At least one group must remain. Deletion canceled
log.model.edges.openAndNonManifold: Detected {openCount} open edges and {nonManifoldCount} non-manifold edges
log.group.selfIntersectTri: Self-intersecting triangles detected in the current group
log.replicad.edgePlane.fail: Failed to create edge-cut plane. Skipping triangle
log.replicad.edgeSketch.fail: Failed to create edge-cut sketch. Skipping triangle
log.replicad.slopeSketch.fail: Failed to create slope-tool sketch. Skipping this edge
log.replicad.slopeTool.fail: Failed to create slope tool. Skipping this edge
log.replicad.tabPoint.fallback: Failed to create tab vertices from edge angles. Using default 45°
log.replicad.tabSketch.fail: Failed to create tab sketch. Skipping this edge
log.replicad.tabGroove.tooNarrow: Tab is too narrow due to geometry constraints. A clip cannot be installed on this edge
log.replicad.tabGrooveSketch.fail: Failed to create clip groove sketch on the tab. Skipping this edge
log.replicad.tabGroove.mayLoose: Tab is too narrow due to geometry constraints. clip fit may be insecure
log.replicad.tabChamfer.fail: Failed to create tab chamfer sketch. Skipping chamfer
log.replicad.offset.reason.degenerateInp: Degenerate original triangle (coincident points or area too small)
log.replicad.offset.reason.parallelShift: Offset edges cannot intersect (offset too large or nearly parallel)
log.replicad.offset.reason.degenerateRes: Degenerate offset result (new triangle area too small)
log.replicad.offset.reason.flipped: Offset caused triangle flip (offset too large)
log.replicad.offset.reason.outsideOrigin: Offset result moved outside the original triangle (violates inward offset)
log.replicad.offset.reason.infeasibleOff: Offset caused triangle flip (offset too large)
log.replicad.offset.fail: Triangle inward offset failed. Skipping inward offset. Reason: {reason}
log.replicad.invalid.afterTab: Solid is not a valid OCCT shape after tab generation
log.replicad.invalid.afterSlope: Solid is not a valid OCCT shape after applying slope tool
log.replicad.invalid.final: Final solid is not a valid OCCT shape
log.replicad.noTriangles: No unfolded triangles available for modeling
